text: Tamra Judge ’ s nasty family feud exploded after her teenage son refused to give his dad a ticket to his graduation ceremony and RadarOnline. com has the exclusive scoop about the bitter battle. The Real Housewives of Orange County star posted two photos of Spencer celebrating his high school graduation and his upcoming 18th birthday with a sweet tribute. “ My tall handsome, smart, shy, kind hearted, loving son Spencer graduates today & turns 18 ( June 14 ). I can ’ t stop crying and wondering HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE? I love him so much I know life has so many wonderful things in store for you! Congratulations son # 2018 # # donttouchthehair, ” she wrote.
